name: SSF9
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 9
subtitle: HER2: Immunohistochemistry (IHC) Test Interpretation
notes:
**Note 1**:  Record the results of only the immunohistochemical (IHC) test for Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2) in this field.

**Note 2**:  The same laboratory test should be used to record information in CS Site-Specific Factors 8 and 9.

**Note 3**:  If the test is not mentioned in the medical record, code to 999 unless there are circumstances under which the test isn't performed, for example no histologic specimen.
rows: Borderline; equivocal; indeterminate; undetermined whether positive or negative

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 988 may result in an edit error.)
Test ordered, results not in chart
Test not done (test not ordered and not performed)

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
